# Contributing

## Setup
```
git clone git@github.com:esdocs/esdocs.git
cd esdocs
npm install
```

## Running Tests
Quick run tests
```
npm run test
```

You can see output documentation after runt tests.
```
# see http://localhost:8080/test/fixture/dest/esdocs
npm run start
```

## Install From Head
Install esdocs from head revision.

```
npm install -g ./
esdocs -h
```
